SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Team

java.lang.Object
cycling.Team
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Team extends Object implements Serializable
Team stores information regarding a team such as riders and the properties associated with it
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Team

      public Team()
      An empty constructor used to make a temporarily empty team

    • Team

      public Team(String name, String description, Map<Integer,Team> teams)
      Creates a new team with the provided parameters. Also generates a unique random ID for the team.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of this team.
      description - The description of this team.
      teams - The list of all teams in CyclingPortalImpl

    • addRider

      public int addRider(String name, int yearOfBirth)
      Adds a rider to a team
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the rider
      yearOfBirth - The year the rider was born
      Returns:
      The unique ID of the rider added to this team

    • findRider

      public static Rider findRider(int riderId, Map<Integer,Team> teams)
      Finds a rider using their id
      Parameters:
      riderId - The unique ID of the rider being searched for
      teams - The list of all teams in CyclingPortalImpl
      Returns:
      The rider that riderId belongs to

      Parameters:
